Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1/e {{ModID:
LitD_Music.TravisHouse
                    /20 90
                    /TravisV -1000 -1000 2 farmer 16 91 1

                /--SETUP EXTRAS
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /ignoreCollisions TravisV
                        /ignoreCollisions farmer
                        /addConversationTopic LitD_CT_TownEncounter 2
                        /action AddMail Current LitD_M_SeenTravisEventToday received
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /skippable

                /--BEGIN EVENT
                        /advancedMove farmer false 7 0 3 10
                        /pause 1500
                        /showFrame TravisV 34
                        /playSound doorClose
                        /warp TravisV 20 89 true
                        /pause 50
                        /emote TravisV 40
                        /pause 500
                        /showFrame TravisV 36
                        /jump TravisV
                        /textAboveHead TravisV "Farmer!"
                        /pause 1000
                        
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 0 2 1 0 1 10
                        /pause 1300
                        /emote farmer 8 true
                        /pause 500
                        /emote TravisV 56 true
                        /jump TravisV 5
                        /pause 300
                        /jump TravisV 5
                        /pause 200

                    /speak TravisV "Aye, how lucky am I to run into ya?$11#$b#Don't mean to hold you up, but I've got a question for ya.$l"
                        /emote farmer 8

                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.{{Trav6Question}}
                /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.Romantic:
resetVariable
                        /faceDirection TravisV 2
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame TravisV 34 true
                        /emote TravisV 40
                        /pause 100
                        /showFrame TravisV 33 true
                    /speak TravisV "[LocalizedText Strings/LitD/DynamicEventStrings:TravisV.IntroReaction]"
                        /showFrame TravisV 4
                        /pause 300
                        /emote farmer 60
                        /emote TravisV 56 
                    /speak TravisV "Would you like to hit the Stardrop Saloon for a bite to eat sometime?$11#$b#I'd love a chance to get to know you a little better.$9"
                    /quickQuestion Have lunch with Travis? #Sure, but as friends. # Me too... Let's make it a date. <

                    (break)emote TravisV 60
                        \speak TravisV "Roger that. Heard ya loud and clear.$11#$b#Meet me at the Saloon around 7pm sometime after today.$l#$b#Got a Jerrand I needa run tonight, unfortunately.$6"
                            \action AddMail Current LitD_M_RejectedTravisDate received
                            \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C1\end
                    (break)showframe TravisV 33
                            \pause 75
                            \emote TravisV 280
                        \speak TravisV "Aye aye. Glad we're on the same page.$9"
                            \showFrame TravisV 4
                         \speak TravisV "Meet me at the Saloon around 7pm sometime after today.$24#$b#I'll be lookin' forward to it.$25"
                            \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                            \action AddMail Current LitD_M_AcceptedTravisDate received
                        \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C2\end
                /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.Platonic:
resetVariable
                        /emote TravisV 32
                    /speak TravisV "Soooo I was thinkin'... We've bumped into each other quite a bit, but I feel like I don't know a lot about ya.$6#$b#Would you like to hit the Stardrop Saloon for a bite to eat sometime?$l"

                    /quickQuestion Have lunch with Travis? #Sure, sounds like a plan! # How about... we make it a date? <
                    (break)emote farmer 212
                            \emote TravisV 56 true
                            \jump TravisV 5
                            \pause 300
                            \jump TravisV 5
                        \speak TravisV "Aight then, I'll scratch that down so I do't forget!$11#$b#I'm lookin' forward to it.$l"
                            \emote TravisV 32
                        \speak TravisV "Meet me at the Saloon around 7pm sometime after today.$l#$b#Got a Jerrand I needa run tonight, unfortunately.$6"
                        \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C1\end
                    (break)emote farmer 20 true
                            \pause 500
                            \emote TravisV 16 true
                            \showFrame TravisV 36
                            \jump TravisV\pause 1000
                        \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.Platonic.AskOutTravis.{{AskOutTravis}}\end
                /end
resetVariable
                    /speak TravisV "I... honestly didn't think you were interested in me like that.$21"
                        /showFrame TravisV 33
                        /emote TravisV 280
                    /speak TravisV "Color me pleasantly surprised. I'd love to make it a date.$24"
                        /showFrame TravisV 4
                    /speak TravisV "Meet me at the Saloon around 7pm sometime after today.$24#$b#I'll be lookin' forward to it.$25"
                        /action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                        /action AddMail Current LitD_M_AcceptedTravisDate received
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C2
                /end

resetVariable
                    /speak TravisV "I...uh.$u"
                        /showFrame TravisV 35
                        /emote TravisV 28
                        /pause 50
                        /showFrame TravisV 36
                    /speak TravisV "[LocalizedText Strings/LitD/DynamicEventStrings:TravisV.Homewrecker]"
                        /showFrame TravisV 4
                        /pause 100
                        /emote farmer 28
                        /action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisRejectedPlayerDate received
                    /speak TravisV "So um... meet me at the Saloon around 7pm sometime after today, aight?$29#$b#Got a Jerrand I needa run tonight, unfortunately.$20"
                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C3
                /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C1:
resetVariable
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "Catch ya later, farmer!"
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 1 0 0 -1 6 0 0 -10 4 10
                        /pause 800
                        /faceDirection farmer 0
                        /pause 400
                        /faceDirection farmer 1 true
                        /emote farmer 56
                        /pause 800
                        /globalFade 0.012
                        /viewport -1000 -1000
                    /message "Saloon around 7pm sometime after today. Got it!"
                /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C2:
resetVariable
                        /pause 500
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 1 0 1 10
                        /proceedPosition TravisV
                        /pause 500
                        /showFrame TravisV 48
                        /positionOffset TravisV 5 0
                        /pause 30
                        /positionOffset TravisV 5 0
                        /pause 30
                        /showframe farmer 89 true
                        /shake TravisV 300
                        /pause 100
                        /startJittering
                        /pause 100
                        /playSound dwop
                        /pause 100
                        /StopJittering
                    /message "Travis gently takes your hands and slips something into your palms..."
                        /emote farmer 8
                        /action AddItem (O){{ModID}}_Items.MoonRoseBoutonniere 1 
                        /positionOffset TravisV -5 0
                        /pause 30
                        /positionOffset TravisV -5 0
                        /pause 30
                        /showFrame TravisV 4
                        /faceDirection farmer 3
                    /speak TravisV "See you soon, @...$9"
                        /emote TravisV 280
                        /pause 200
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 0 -1 6 0 0 -10 4 10
                        /pause 700
                        /faceDirection farmer 0
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection farmer 1 true
                        /emote farmer 20
                        /pause 800
                        /globalFade 0.012
                        /viewport -1000 -1000
                        /action AddMail Current LitD_M_ReceivedMoonRoseBoutonniere received
                    /message "Looks like I got a date at the Saloon this week..."
                    
                /end
Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P1.C3:
resetVariable
                        /speed TravisV 3
                    /textAboveHead TravisV "C'ya farmer!"
                        /advancedMove TravisV false 1 0 0 -1 6 0 0 -10 4 10
                        /pause 500
                        /faceDirection farmer 0
                        /pause 300
                        /faceDirection farmer 1 true
                        /emote farmer 28
                        /pause 800
                        /globalFade 0.012
                        /viewport -1000 -1000
                    /message "Well. That sure was awkward."
                /end

Entries.{{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2:
LitD_Music.Blues
                    /14 21
                    /TravisV 9 5 3 farmer 14 24 0  Emily 11 10 2 Gus 8 6 1 Pam 7 19 1 Shane 21 17 2 Elliott 3 19 2 Leah 5 20 3 Lewis 6 17 1 Marnie 5 17 3 Demetrius 25 22 1 Robin 24 22 3 Clint 18 22 2 Sam 36 21 1 Abigail 39 19 2 Sebastian 42 21 3 Nova.Eli? 2 20 1 Nova.Dylan? 3 21 0 DN.SnS_Coriander? 33 18 0 Cirrus? 33 18 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra? 21 22 0 SenS 35 7 1 RodneyOBrien? 17 20 0 Willy 1 22 1 Jasper 9 22 1 DN.SnS_Val? 11 23 0 Mateo? 11 23 0 Marlon 10 21 2 Gunther 11 21 2 Juliet 25 18 1 Rosa 26 18 3 MadDog.STW_Cherri? 14 20 2

                /--SETUP EXTRAS
                    /beginSimultaneousCommand
                        /setSkipActions AddItem (O){{ModID}}_Items.ExperimentsOfSauceCookBook 1
                        /removeTile 7 4 Front
                        /doAction 4 16
                        /ignoreCollisions TravisV
                        /ignoreCollisions farmer
                        /ignoreCollisions Emily
                        /ignoreCollisions Gus
                        /ignoreCollisions SenS
                        /ignoreCollisions DN.SnS_Coriander?
                        /ignoreCollisions Cirrus?
                        /animate Gus false true 200 18 18 19 19 20 20 19 19
                        /animate Shane false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 24 24 24 24 23 22 21 20 20 20 20
                        /animate Demetrius false true 200 24 24 25 25 26 26
                        /animate Robin false true 200 20 20 21 21 22 22
                        /animate Willy false true 200 28 29 30 31
                        /animate Sam false true 200 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 34 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4 4
                        /animate MadDog.STW_Cherri? false true 200 24 24 24 24 24 25 25 26 26 26 26 26 26 26 26 26 25 25 25 24 24 24 24 24
                        /animate MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra? false true 120 18 18 18 19 19 19 18 18 18 20 20 20
                        /animate Elliott false true 200 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 17 18 18 18 19 19 18 18 19 19 18 17 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16 16
                        /animate Lewis false true 200 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 19 22 23 23 23 23 23 22 22 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23
                        /animate Marnie false true 200 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 20 21 22 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 23 22 21/
                        /showFrame Pam 24
                        /showFrame TravisV 49
                        /advancedMove SenS true 0 1 2 0 4 1500 -2 0 0 -1 1 1300
                        /advancedMove DN.SnS_Coriander? true 2 0 4 5000 -2 0 4 4800
                        /advancedMove Cirrus? true 2 0 4 5000 -2 0 4 4800
                        /addConversationTopic LitD_CT_SaloonDate 2
                        /action AddMail Current LitD_M_SeenTravisEventToday received
                        /addTemporaryActor CoffeeMakerKun 16 32 5 5 0 false character
                    /endSimultaneousCommand
                    /skippable

                /--BEGIN EVENT
                    
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 -3 -2 0 0 -1 -6 0 0 -2 -2 0 0 -7 6 0 1 10
                        /pause 1000
                        /viewport move -1 -1 5500
                        /pause 500
                    /speak Gus "You know she's worried sick...$2"
                        /emote TravisV 40 true
                        /showframe TravisV 52
                        /pause 200
                    /speak TravisV "I appreciate the concern, Gus, but I'm expecting company...$22#$b#I don't really want to think about this right now.$5"
                        /stopAnimation Gus 18
                        /emote Gus 28 true
                    /speak Gus "...At least consider-$2"
                        /pause 300
                        /emote farmer 8 true
                        /pause 600
                        /emote Emily 16 true
                        /faceDirection Emily 0 true
                        /jump Emily
                        /showframe TravisV 53
                        /pause 300
                    /speak Emily "Uh hey, Gus!$6#$b#I um, lost the bottle opener. Could I get some help finding it?$s"
                        /showFrame Gus 4
                    /textAboveHead Gus "...responding to her calls."
                        /pause 3000
                        /emote TravisV 40 true
                        /showframe TravisV 52
                        /pause 100
                        /advancedMove Gus false 3 0 0 2 2 10
                        /proceedPosition Gus
                        /doAction 11 9
                        /pause 300
                        /advancedMove Emily false 0 1 2 0 3 10
                        /pause 300
                        /advancedMove Gus false 0 3 1 0 3 10
                        /proceedPosition Gus
                    /speak Gus "Evening, @. Travis is waiting for you.#$b#Emily will be with you both momentarily with tonight's special.$h"
                        /emote farmer 56 true
                        /advancedMove farmer false 1 0 0 -4 4 10
                        /pause 400
                        /advancedMove Gus false -8 0 0 7 3 0 0 -1 7 0 3 10
                        /pause 500
                        /advancedMove Emily false -9 0 0 7 3 0 0 -1 6 0 1 10
                        /pause 1500
                        /showframe TravisV 53
                    /speak TravisV "Aye, look what the cat dragged in.$9#$b#Take a seat, take a seat.$12"
                        /advancedMove farmer false 0 -1 -6 0 0 -1 1 10
                        /pause 500
                        /action If Spiderbuttons.BETAS_PLAYER_HAS_EQUIPPED Current (O){{ModID}}_Items.MoonRoseBoutonniere ## Spiderbuttons.BETAS_DialogueBox TravisV Strings\LitD\DynamicEventStrings:TravisV.BoutonniereRemark
                        /pause 1500
                        /showFrame TravisV 49
                        /pause 2500
                        /showFrame farmer 117
                    /speak TravisV "Heh. I'll have you know, I've been awaiting your arrival with bated-breath.$9"
                    /quickQuestion # The dramatic type, are we? # Well don't keep holding it in, breathtaking. < # Make seagull squawks.

                    (break)pause 1
                            \emote farmer 32 true
                            \pause 600
                            \emote TravisV 56
                        \speak TravisV "Can't help it, ya see.$11#$b#It's in my blood. I grew up on the big screen.$26"
                            \pause 100
                            \showFrame TravisV 49
                            \emote TravisV 32
                        \speak TravisV "But let's not get side tracked with myself. How 'bout ya tell me a little about you?$l"
                    (break)pause 1
                            \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                            \emote farmer 20
                            \pause 100
                            \showFrame TravisV 52
                            \emote TravisV 280
                        \speak TravisV "Oh ho ho. Now that's my speed. But, let's slow down...$9#$b#I find you terribly charming, however, I'd like to get to know you a tad more personally before we get too frisky.$24" 
                            \pause 200
                            \showFrame TravisV 50
                            \emote TravisV 56
                        \speak TravisV "Won't you tell me a little about yourself?$31"
                    (break)pause 1
                            \playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                            \action IncrementStat LitD_M_GullInsanity 1
                            \action AddMail Current LitD_M_PretendedToBeAGull received
                        \beginSimultaneousCommand\pause 1
                            \textAboveHead CoffeeMakerKun "MINE MINE MINE"
                            \jump CoffeeMakerKun\pause 1
                            \jump farmer\pause 1
                            \showFrame TravisV 55
                        \endSimultaneousCommand\pause 1
                            \faceDirection farmer 1 true
                            \pause 3000
                        \speak TravisV "...Uh. Yeah! Yeah. Um.$29#$b#(Am I being mocked? Oh Yoba.)$30"
                            \showFrame TravisV 54
                            \emote TravisV 28
                            \pause 100
                            \showFrame TravisV 52
                            \pause 300
                        \speak TravisV "Why don't you uh... sit down and tell me a little about yourself?$20"
                            \showFrame farmer 117
                        /showFrame TravisV 49

                    /quickQuestion I'm a... # ...normal guy, just trying to get by. # ...farmer, keeping this town well fed! # ...farmer, but more of the ranching sort! # ...adventurer, always seeking my next big escapade! # ...fisherman, sitting seaside reeling in big ones. # ...naturalist, living off of nature's bounty. # ...miner, spending my days toiling away in the dirt. # ...seagull. MINE MINE MINE. 

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.1 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Is that right? Maybe I should call ya Joe since you seem to think you're so average.$h"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.2 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Heh! I heard your crops make it all the way to the big city, Apples.$ll#$b#Mind if I call you that?$26"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.3 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Hey hoo! So you really are a Buckaroo!$13#$b#If you'd mind me calling you that.$24"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.4 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Ah, so you like a life full of thrills?$12#$b#Ya sound like the Rowdy type, if I may call you that.$13"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.5 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Aye, well on your way to being a pirate I see!$13#$b#Mind if I call ya Captain?$28"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.6 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Now that's a way to live! Get out there and blaze those trails, Trailblazer.$12#$b#...If I'm allowed to call you that.$20"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1
                                
                        (break)showFrame TravisV 56
                                \emote TravisV 56
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.7 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Sounds like hard work.$6#$b#Couldn't imagine that kinda life but I can respect it, Pebbles.$27#$b#Can I call ya Pebbles?$26"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Regular\pause 1

                        (break)playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                                \action IncrementStat LitD_M_GullInsanity 1
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_PretendedToBeAGull received
                            \beginSimultaneousCommand\pause 1
                                \textAboveHead CoffeeMakerKun "MINE MINE MINE"
                                \jump CoffeeMakerKun\pause 1
                                \jump farmer\pause 1
                                \showFrame TravisV 55
                            \endSimultaneousCommand\pause 1
                                \faceDirection farmer 1 true
                                \pause 3000
                            \speak TravisV "You're... a seagull?$21#$b#Erm.$29#$b#Well... I'm not one to judge how people choose to identify.$6#$b#You mind if I call you... er. Seagull?$29"
                                \switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Nickname.Seagull\pause 1
                        
                    /end
resetVariable
                    /quickQuestion Let Travis give you a nickname? # Go for it, I don't mind. # Use my name, please. # Got any sweeter names in mind...? <
                        (break)emote TravisV 32
                                \showFrame TravisV 56
                            \speak TravisV "Alright, well that's that.$l#$b#I love givin' my buds nicknames. I call Emily 'Smiles'.$26"

                        (break)emote TravisV 16
                                \showFrame TravisV 53
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisUseMyName Received
                            \speak TravisV "Oh! Certainly. I'd never want you to feel disrespected.$u#$b#My apologies, I've got a tendency to get carried away.$20"

                        (break)showFrame TravisV 52
                                \emote TravisV 280
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.10 Received
                                \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                            \speak TravisV "Oh, would you like something more intimate?$24#$b#How about... My Rose?$31"
                                \emote farmer 20

                    /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Cont
                /end

resetVariable
                    /quickQuestion Let Travis call you Seagull? # YES! It's extremely validating. Thank you. MINE. # That's CAPTAIN Seagull to you! # NO! I may be a seagull but my name is {{PlayerName}}! MINE. # Mine. <
                        (break)playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                                \showFrame farmer 117
                                \emote farmer 212 true 
                                \pause 900
                                \emote TravisV 28 true
                                \showFrame TravisV 54
                                \pause 100
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.8 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Uhhh. Yeah. I'd be happy to call you Seagull, I guess.$21#$b#(This guy is definitely messing with me.)$22"

                        (break)playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                                \showFrame farmer 117
                                \emote farmer 236 true 
                                \pause 900
                                \emote TravisV 28 true
                                \showFrame TravisV 54
                                \pause 100
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.9 Received
                            \speak TravisV "Uhhh... Aye, aye, Captain Seagull?$21#$b#(This guy is definitely messing with me.)$22"

                        (break)playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                                \showFrame farmer 117
                                \emote farmer 12 true 
                                \pause 900
                                \emote TravisV 28 true
                                \showFrame TravisV 54
                                \pause 100
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisUseMyName Received
                            \speak TravisV " Woah, sorry buddy. Didn't mean to reduce ya to just your bird of origin.$21#$b#(Man I thought I was weird.)$29"

                        (break)playSound LitD_SFX.SeagullFake\pause 1
                                \showFrame farmer 117
                                \emote farmer 20 true 
                                \pause 900
                                \emote TravisV 28 true
                                \showFrame TravisV 54
                                \pause 100
                                \action IncrementStat LitD.TravisFlirt 1
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisNickName.8 Received
                            \speak TravisV "I... Uh... I'll just call ya seagull then.$21#$b#(What is with this guy?)$29"

                        /switchEvent {{ModID}}_Events.TravisV.6H.P2.Romantic.Cont
                    /end

resetVariable
                        /showFrame TravisV 49
                    /speak TravisV "I had something special prepared for us tonight, by the way.$31#$b#I haven't pulled out this recipe in a long time.$l"

                     /quickQuestion # Oh, are you a cook? # Painting, cooking, playing guitar... Is there anything you can't do? # Pulling out all the stops, hm? You seem serious. <  # *Incoherent seagull noises*
                        (break)
                            \speak TravisV " Ah, insightful, are we? Aye, it's true.$31#$b#I was born and raised with a silver spoon not in my mouth, but in my left hand. I've learned from the best of the best.$33"
                        (break)
                            \speak TravisV "Hah! You flatter me, but certainly. I can't drive, and my writing skills leave a lot to be desired.$20#$b#Art and music are hobbies I enjoy, but cooking? That's my passion.$31#$b#I grew up under the wing of the best of the best.$33"                        
                        (break)
                            \speak TravisV "Oh yes, I don't play games when it comes to romance.$9#$b#I grew up around some of the best of the best cooks in Ferngill.$31#$b#I'd love for you to get a taste of my work.$8"
                        (break)
                            \speak TravisV "I. Yeah. So um, I trained under some of the best cooks in Ferngill.$21#$b#I'm excited for you to get a chance to try my work...$29#$b#(I think I've made a mistake...)$30"

                    /speak Emily "Two piping hot Deluxe Fiddlehead Risottos, fresh out of the pan! Enjoy.#h"
                    /speak TravisV "Thank you, Emily. You've been a dear as always.$l"
                    /quickQuestion # Yeah, thanks so much! # MINE. MINE. MINE.
                        (break)
                            \speak Emily "(Good luck, you got 'em tiger!)"
                            \speak TravisV "(Thanks, but I'm more of a tom cat.~)$25"
                        (break)
                            \speak Emily " Uhhhh.... Yeah!#$b#(They seem a little possessive, are you sure this is a good call?)$s"
                            \speak TravisV "(No I think they just have seagullitis. It may be terminal.)$29"
                            \speak Emily "(Oh. Be sure not to catch any Seagull Transmitted Diseases.)$6"
                            \speak TravisV "(Trying my best.)$29"

                        /emote farmer 8
                        /speak TravisV "Anywho... I hope you enjoy. This is my favorite recipe.$31#$b#It has cheese, but I requested a vegan kind since I'm not too sure of your diet.$33"

                        /quickQuestion That's very thoughtful of you...# I'll eat just about anything put in front of me! # I am vegan! I love my greens # I'm vegetarian. # I'm pescatarian. Fish all the way down! # I'm usually a flesh eating carnivore... But for you, I'll give it a shot. # There's a few things I can't eat... (Kosher, halal, common allergies) # SQUAAAWWWK.
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.NoRestriction Received
                                \speak TravisV "Haha, good to know. I happen to be pescatarian myself.$11#$b#I love myself a good salmon.$31"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.Vegan Received
                                \speak TravisV "Wowza, that's impressive! I don't think I could give up dairy and egg.$l#$b#I'm pescatarian myself, can't help loving myself a good fish.$31"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.Vegetarian Received
                                \speak TravisV "Wow, how interesting! You must have a lot of will power!$1#$b#I'm pescatarian myself, I couldn't bring myself to give up fish.$31"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.Pescatarian Received
                                \speak TravisV "Oh, really? So am I! I love myself a good fish. I can't bring myself to eat red meats meat and poultry.$23#$b#The industry is deeply upsetting. But let's not get off course with something saddening...$34"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.Carnivore Received
                                \speak TravisV "Is that so? I'm not sure how good that is for your body, but more power to you.$20#$b#I don't eat red meat or poultry, but I do love myself a good fish.$31"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.GeneralRestriction Received
                                \speak TravisV "Ah, good to know! Thanks for telling me. I'll make sure that never winds up under your nose.$l#$b#No big restrictions for me, but I happen to be pescatarian myself.$26"
                            (break)
                                \action AddMail Current LitD_M_TravisDiet.NoRestriction Received
                                \speak TravisV "...I get the vibe you probably will eat anything.$29#$b#(What am I getting myself into?)$30"

                    /message "You can update Travis's nickname for you any time in the config files."
                /end
